ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: DDD worthless? How would you change it?
ygData.msgSnippet: Did you say Engineer? /em runs away screaming! (I keep saying I m going to write a book on my experiences in the Nuclear industry, lots of stories about crazy
ygData.messageBody:
Did you say Engineer? /em runs away screaming! (I keep saying I'm going to
write a book on my experiences in the Nuclear industry, lots of stories
about crazy engineers.)


For exp before 50 Kedge Keep rocks, but you need a decent group. Through the
mid 40's the second floor is great, then you move in past Estrella's Mermaid
Bordello to the Roman Pleasure palace. As you get better, you can pull a
wider and wider area from either loc. Leveled my bard about 12 levels there
and now my wiz is leveling there too. I will say I am completely conditioned
to yell for EB whenever I hear a Palm Pilot beep. Coworkers just don't
understand 'Stone now!' though.

Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe
Excalibur, Xegony
